verses.verse: (1 He exhorteth the Gentiles to praise God, because he hath accomplished as well to them as to the Jews, the promise of life everlasting by Jesus Christ.) All (Cross references: : Rom. 15:11) nations, praise ye the Lord: all ye people, praise him.
For his loving kindness is great toward us, and the (That is, the most certain and continual testimonies of his Fatherly graces.) truth of the Lord endureth forever. Praise ye the Lord.
